short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a random image from a set of selected Biodiversity Heritage Library files on Wikimedia Commons on new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This add-on shows a random image from a set of selected Biodiversity Heritage Library files on Wikimedia Commons on new tabs.

Currently it displays only the beautiful drawings of Emil Goeldi of Amazonian birds and Ernst Haeckel drawings from Kunstformen der Natur, but it will soon include other curated images.
